EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Job_Applying_For__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name}:
We appreciate your valuable time and interest in Borrego Solar and enjoyed meeting with you regarding the {!Lead.Job_Applying_For__c} position. While we were impressed with your qualifications, and with you, a candidate was selected whose work experience and educational background was more in alignment with the specific position duties and responsibilities required at Borrego Solar at this time.
We will keep your resume on file for any positions as they become available over the next six months.
We wish you all the best in your professional endeavors and again, thank you for your interest in employment opportunities with Borrego Solar.
Sincerely,
Borrego Solar Systems, Inc. Human Resource Department
